My Skills

My Projects

Automatic Music Genre Classification - published on International Journal of Pure and Applied Mathematics.

We study the performances of various different classifiers that recognises the patterns with different accuracies.The audio processing is considered frame by frame.We discuss the application of Convolutional Neural Networks and Convolutional Recurrent Neural Networks with transfer learning techniques to recognise the genre of the given song.

IDify for HackIndia 2015, Bangalore

Made an android app that can verify the user on the basis of PAN, Adhaar, Voter, Driving License from the goverment's database. Verification takes place from the respective self made Python CGI based APIs.
It helps people and officials verify people's identity just a click away. It helps people avoiding forgery.A common platform to verify various IDs which has'nt been unified before altogether. This is improved UI and hassle free application.

Covid Stats

One stop for all the info you need to know to stay safe in this crisis with world wide statistics.

Forex Trading Webapp

Worked with Angular 5 for scalability and performance and Implemented rest APIs for maintaining secured and independent structure and also used Hibernate for building backend apis and tomcat for mock deployment.

Chatapp

Developed an Android app in which users can chat with random people who has signed up.

Restaurant Finder

Restaurant finder is a python based API which helps the users to find the restaurants on their given interests and location.

File uploader for android

This uploading method can be used when the api does not support MULTI-PARTING to where the file should be uploaded. It sends the file in single stream.
